net.krotscheck.dfr.stream

Class AbstractStreamEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krotscheck.dfr.AbstractFilteredDataStream
      • net.krotscheck.dfr.AbstractDataEncoder
        • net.krotscheck.dfr.stream.AbstractStreamEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, IDataEncoder, IFilteringDataStream, IStreamEncoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BSONDataEncoder

    public abstract class AbstractStreamEncoder
extends AbstractDataEncoder
implements IStreamEncoder
    An abstract implementation of the data encoder, to consolidate some common functionality and provide a simple extension point.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck
